body:
## What happened

Error when IDE losses access to filesystem as part of security policy.  Can we turn these off if it recovers.

## Version information

IntelliJ IDEA `2019.1.2` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 38.2.2` • Dart plugin `191.8405`

No Flutter sdk configured.

## Exception

update failed for ActionGroup: null (null)[null]

comment_data.body: The issue causing the reported error in this stack trace was fixed in the latest plugin release. Updating the plugin should fix this issue.

title: Error when IDE losses access to filesystem
